value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Luckily, much of the library survived
whatever tragedy befell this land...$k$pJudging from what I learned, this Askr
is several years ahead of our own.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Really? Then is there an older
Sharena here?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I'm afraid not...$k$pAccording to what I've read, the
Sharena that lived here has already
passed away.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|WHAT? I died?$k$pBut...looking at the state of this
place...it's hardly surprising.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Did your reading shed any light on
the cause of all this destruction?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I located some rather intriguing
passages. Let me read you some...$k$p"The mighty king was cut down—
victim to the curse of the ruler
of the dead..."$k$p"As destruction took hold, we joined
with Embla to seek the forbidden
heart..."$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|A forbidden heart? What could
that be?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It's not clear. But it seems to be
the key to a ritual Askr and Embla
performed to combat Hel.$k$p"The Heart's Rite is the only
method that may bring the
ruler of the dead low..."$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Now, that's what I call a clue!
Whatever this heart may be, it
spells Hel's defeat, it seems.$k$pWe have our objective, I'd say.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Not so fast, Commander.$k$p"Though it may slay the ruler of
the dead, it too spells our end...$k$p"With every pulse, it steals one
life.$k$p"And so, death ravaged us in an
eyeblink... First towns fell, and
ultimately all the land...$k$p"People, beasts, any that drew
breath—death came for all.$k$p"Mighty dragon Askr, forgive us this
sin, unforgivable though it may be.$k$p"We beg of you one thing only:
salvation."$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Are you saying that THIS is what
happened here?$k$pTo defeat Hel, our Askr would need
to become like this one?$k$pIf that is true... It's a cost that is far
too great to contemplate.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Terrible...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|What NOW?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Hmph.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Líf...why is your pursuit of us
so dogged? Must we die?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|To battle!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Urk!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Líf, wait! A question!$k$pThat's not your name, is it? Líf?
I'm right, aren't I?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Hmph.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I once thought you were my
ancestor—the first Askran king—
as you claimed...$k$p$Sbs4000|But that isn't true, is it? You know
Sharena. And it's not just that you
know her. You care for her.$k$pYou couldn't bring yourself to
strike her, and you made an offering
of her favorite flowers...$k$pThat means you are of our era, not
the distant past. And you can open
gates, like all Askran royalty.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|So?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|So, all that being true, there is
only one person you might be.$k$pI know your name. Your real name.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Silence!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Alfonse. That is your name.$k$p$Sbs150|
